name: The Pawspector - Monthly Mini-Game #2
description:
Axol Studio's 2021 Monthly Mini-game #2

You are the Pawspector! Legends say this secluded, and dangerous valley is full of buried gold! Pan the shallow water to pinpoint the best locations to dig - and then make it out of the valley in one piece before the deadly curse catches up with you!

This game was made in a SINGLE MONTH for Axol Studio's 2021 Monthly Mini-game project! It shows off a chunk of a game's idea and should be seen as more of a proof-of-concept than a 100% realized and polished game experience. 

MODIFIER: Non-Human Character(s)! - The game should feature non-human characters!

If you want to be involved with our 1-game-a-month experiment and join our community, visit us at https://www.patreon.com/axolstudio

When you buy this game, the Source Code is also included.

Music by Naomi A Hely

How to Play:

ActionKeyboardGamepadMovementArrow Keys / WASDDPAD / Analog Stick
Action (Based on Icon at bottom right)XAToggle FullscreenAlt+Enter
